document_data.name: Moonside Lane
document_data.mainbody: '''Moonside Lane''' was a small street found in the town of [[New Velar|Harrowdale]].
document_data.Description: Moonside Lane crossed through the town, beginning at the ruins of [[Halvan's Keep]] and passing southeast through town and intersecting [[Melurk Street]] to end on the [[Heart of the Harbor]] pier on the waters of the [[Dragon Reach]].
